Generation I.Red: It spits out PoisonPowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid .
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: It spits out PoisonPowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid .
Generation I.Yellow: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.
Generation I.Stadium: Armed with razor-sharp leaves, it uses toxic pollen to immobilize its enemy and melts the helpless foe with Acid .

Generation II.Gold: Even though it is filled with Acid , it does not melt because it also oozes a neutralizing fluid.
Generation II.Silver: If its prey is bigger than its mouth, it slices up the victim with sharp leaves, then eats every morsel.
Generation II.Crystal: When it's hungry, it swings its razor-sharp leaves, slicing up any unlucky object nearby for food.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Even though it is filled with Acid , it does not melt because it also oozes a neutralizing fluid. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) If its prey is bigger than its mouth, it slices up the victim with sharp leaves, then eats every morsel. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the Pok é mon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
Generation III.Sapphire: Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the Pok é mon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
Generation III.Emerald: At night, a Weepinbell hangs on to a tree branch with its hooked rear and sleeps. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.
Generation III.FireRed: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It spits out PoisonPowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid .
